queries.name: Find ALL Shortest Paths to Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Find ALL Shortest Paths to Domain Admins - Network

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH p,nodes(p) as nds MATCH q = ((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds WITH p,q,nds,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix RETURN p,q

queries.name: Find ALL Shortest Paths to Domain Admins - Filtered

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH nodes(p) as nds,p MATCH (src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins - Network

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH p,nodes(p) as nds MATCH q = ((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds WITH p,q,nds,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix RETURN p,q

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins - Filtered

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH nodes(p) as nds,p MATCH q=((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,q,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,q,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p,q

queries.name: Shortest Paths to High Value Targets - Network

queryList.title: Select a Domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE m<>n WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH q = ((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds WITH p,q,nds,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix RETURN p,q

queries.name: Shortest Paths to High Value Targets - Filtered

queryList.title: Select a Domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE m<>n WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH (src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unconstrained Delegation Systems - Network

queryList.query: MATCH (n) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH q = ((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds WITH p,q,nds,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix RETURN p,q

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unconstrained Delegation Systems - Filtered

queryList.query: MATCH (n) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH (src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Kerberoastable Users - Network

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User {hasspn:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH q = ((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds WITH p,q,nds,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix RETURN p,q

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Kerberoastable Users - Filtered

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User {hasspn:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH (src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Path from Owned Principals - Network

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n) WHERE n.owned=true RETURN n.name, n.PwdLastSet ORDER BY n.PwdLastSet ASC

MATCH p=shortestPath((a {name:$result})-[:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) WHERE NOT a=b WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH q = ((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds WITH p,q,nds,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix RETURN p,q

queries.name: Shortest Path from Owned Principals - Filtered

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n) WHERE n.owned=true RETURN n.name, n.PwdLastSet ORDER BY n.PwdLastSet ASC

MATCH p=shortestPath((a {name:$result})-[:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) WHERE NOT a=b WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH (src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH q = ((src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer)) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds WITH p,q,nds,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix RETURN p,q

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...

MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m WITH p, nodes(p) AS nds MATCH (src:Computer)-[:Open]->(trgt:Computer) MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE src IN nds AND trgt IN nds AND c IN nds WITH p,nds,c,src,trgt,reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN src THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS srcix, reduce(ix = -1, i IN RANGE(0,SIZE(nds)-1) | CASE nds[i] WHEN trgt THEN i ELSE ix END ) AS trgtix WHERE trgtix > srcix WITH p,size(collect(DISTINCT c)) AS total_hosts, size(collect(DISTINCT trgt)) AS total_targets WHERE total_hosts = total_targets + 1 RETURN p
